sentence.Network_en: I encourage oboe and clarinet players to use plenty of vibrato.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French clarinette, diminutive of c̣larine, denoting a kind of bell; related to clarion

entry.def: A clarinet is a musical instrument in the shape of a pipe. You play the clarinet by blowing into it and covering and uncovering the holes with your fingers.

means.word_mean: 1. a single-reed instrument with a straight tube
